name: Shnapennarium Text Adventure
description:
A short text adventure created for a Game Dev class on Udemy. Just going back to the basics of Unity functions so I had room to get creative with the writing. 

Choose a science project, also a meal for supper, and maybe you won't die. It's really just a short exercice, not even a menu. Make choices with 1-3 keys and quit with Alt-F4. Your feedback is always welcome.

So let's science it up!
